description: Dashboard for MicroService API Gateway Apache APISIX, made by hambn

panels.title: APISIX http status requests in RC(Requests count) by total

targets.expr: sum(rate(apisix_http_status{service=~"$service", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", upstream_addr=~"$upstream_addr", route_name=~"$route_name", matched_uri=~"$matched_uri", code=~"$code"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: APISIX http status requests in RPS(Requests per second) by total
All requests (Requests count) by routes and status codes
Total requests (RPS) per routes and status
APISIX http status by services and jobs

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(apisix_http_latency_bucket{service=~"$service", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", upstream_addr=~"$upstream_addr", route_name=~"$route_name", matched_uri=~"$matched_uri", code=~"$code", type="request"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, route_name))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(apisix_http_latency_bucket{service=~"$service", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", upstream_addr=~"$upstream_addr", route_name=~"$route_name", matched_uri=~"$matched_uri", code=~"$code", type="request"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, route_name))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(apisix_http_latency_bucket{service=~"$service", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", upstream_addr=~"$upstream_addr", route_name=~"$route_name", matched_uri=~"$matched_uri", code=~"$code", type="request"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, route_name))
